descriptionHtml:
[url=https://flic.kr/p/rzxC6x][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7591/16788533465_d489f346b3_c.jpg[/img][/url]

Lavena is one of my Nord-warriors which I wanted to share with the community. Hopefully I will be able to turn her into a follower, but till then... Hope you like!

[u][size=4]Required mods: (required if you want her to look exactly the same!)[/size][/u]
- SKSE: [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]?
- SkyUI: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/[/url]?
- RaceMenu Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/[/url]?
- ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/[/url]?
- SeveNBase Body-replacer: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/[/url]?
- SGHairPack; (Google)
- SGTextureRenewal (for UNP): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/[/url]?
- SGEyebrows: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/[/url]?
- The Eyes of Beauty: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/[/url]?
- Citrus-heads: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58989/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58989/[/url]?
- Freckle-mania: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/[/url]?
- [size=2]Better Makeup for SKSE: [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/[/size][/url][size=2]? (both High Res Makeup for SKSE (v1.0b) AND High Res Female Lips for SKSE v1.0)

I stronlgly advise to read the descriptions for the regarding mods, f.i. SeveNBase needs a modified skeleton (f.i. XPMS) and the Better Makeup-mod needs a modification to the SKSE.ini...  

[/size][u][size=4]Installation:[/size]
[/u]- First download the preset;
- Unzip the file to a folder of your choosing;
- Drag and drop (or copy/paste) the Lavena.jslot-file, the one you just unzipped, to: \Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets;
- Start your Skyrim and start a new game or, in-game, type showracemenu in the console(~);
- Choose Nord-race (standard) and change gender to female, but leave at slot 0;
- Go to the Preset-tab of Racemenu and Press F9 to choose preset;
- Choose the Lavena.jslot and confirm... done!

If you have done it all the way it's supposed to be done you should be ready. Enjoy!

[url=https://flic.kr/p/rgL2KW][img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8628/16587257480_ccb7ceed3d_c.jpg[/img][/url]

[u][size=4]Credits:[/size]
[/u]All the credits go to the authors of mentioned mods who made this preset possible. Thank you guys for your awesome mods and creations!

[u][size=4]Special thanks:[/size]
[/u]My special thanks go out to Sunsakuka for helping me test this preset! Thank you Sunsa, you're awesome!
author: Marximus
